SMPPSim

SMPPSim simulates a Short Message Service Centre (SMSC) which provides an application interface which utilises the SMPP protocol over a TCP/IP network connection.
The purposes of SMPPSim is to provide a test system against which developers of messaging applications can test their code.

com.seleniumsoftware.SMPPSim.pdu

com.seleniumsoftware.SMPPSim.util  
tests  
tests.exceptions  

 

SMPPSim simulates a Short Message Service Centre (SMSC) which provides an application interface which utilises the SMPP protocol over a TCP/IP network connection.
The purposes of SMPPSim is to provide a test system against which developers of messaging applications can test their code. Using SMPPSim in this way, should allow developers to produce code which is in a reasonable state for testing against a real SMSC.
It should be noted that SMPPSim is not an SMSC. This may seem obvious, but based on some of the questions sent to support@mobilelandscape.co.uk, it seems worthwhile.
